comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called INDUSTRIA AZUCARERA DE PUERTO RICO - 1898 TO PRESENT (CENTRAL, T, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 11847943@N02
comment._content: I don't like you José you go around amazing imagery for profit purposes. Is sort sad you will come out witch such a prestige name and have that twisted by standards. You are not a nationalized entity so you are falsely representing. I don’t really care who you are but at least form a nonprofit and use the imagery accordingly for conservation and historic purposes.

comment.author: 11592485@N04
comment._content: Who are you directing your comments. To the Library of Congress member of Flickr or to the two brothers, Jose, of the Archivo Historico y Fotografico de P.R.. We do not represent the LOC or have any connection to any other entity. We are posting our personal collection where every item is an original in our collection. Many thousands of more images to be posted. See our website www.archivofotograficodepuertorico.com for more information about us and the Rodriguez Archives Collection.
comment.authorname: ARCHIVO HISTORICO Y FOTOGRAFICO DE PUERTO RICO
